DOC.brief_summary: An open label , extension study subject complete ZPU-003 Ext 1 study .
DOC.brief_title: An Extension Study Evaluating Safety Efficacy Proellex® In Women Who Have Previously Completed ZPU 003 Ext
DOC.detailed_description: This open label , extension study subject complete ZPU-003 Ext 1 study off-drug interval ( menses ) , prior start first 16-week dosing cycle . Subjects receive 50 mg Proellex® daily dose . Total study participation ZPU-003 Ext 2 ( Extension 2 ) may three 4 month drug cycle separate drug interval .
DOC.criteria: Four subject one site complete ZPU 003 Ext 1 study All subject
